      Help
      
      
      
      
      
        
      Welcome to the EPANET Model Viwer App
      
        
      You can do the following:
      
        
        
          
      1. View and Edit EPANET Models
            
        Use the model viewer window, with its accompanying toolbars, and the other various tabs to view and
                edit the model.
        
            
        Click on different sedments of the model to view and edit their properties.
        
          
        2. 
          
      2. Run the EPANET Model Simulation
            
        Click "Run Model"
        
            
        Once complete, a few more tabs and toolbars will be available to view results of the simulation.
            
        
          
        3. 
          
      3. Save the Model
            
        Click "Save Model"
        
            
            
        
            
        Click "Save New Model File" to save it as a new resource to connected to your Hydroshare account
            
        
          
        4. 
          
      4. Click the 'X' in the top-right of the app to return to the NCIMM Apps Library
        5. 
        
      
      
      
      
      
        
      
          Developed at the BYU Hydroinformatics Lab
          
        
      
        View Code
